about_the_game:
There are tensions outside, and you wait for things to turn around. In the monotonous space of day after day, the solemn time produces overflowing consciousness. Everyday things become the constituent elements of the dream, and the brilliance of reality forms the atmosphere of the dream. Drifting in the intertwined every new day, the boundary between reality and dream becomes blurred. You gradually discover that dreams start to affect reality in turn, and you are also slowly gaining surreal abilities. Meanwhile, external tensions seem to have something to do with you...

Made for virtual reality:


With rich and physical environment interaction. Mechanics, challenges and rules for VR.

Changed rules:


Travel through multiple worlds, explore different rules and complete challenges in each world.

You will face:


- Fight your way through hordes of alien robots with machine guns and heavy punches
- Control different superpowers through gestures, float in the air and summon huge meteorites to hit the enemy hard
- Find puzzle pieces hidden in different worlds and open a door to a new world
- Perform a ritual to dispel the creeping darkness

short_description: Welcome to a new day, shuttle in the fantasy dreamland, different adventures, different enemies, different logic. When the boundary between reality and dream slowly blurs, when fantasy becomes the possibility of reality, use your awakened super power to investigate the truth of the world...
